original_text: On the first day of every week, each of you should put some of your money in a safe place. Think about how much God has given you. Then decide how much you can give each week. If you do that, the gift will be ready when I come to you. We will not need to start doing it after I come. Corinthians Introduction
korean_text: 매주 첫날에 너희 각 사람이 수입에 따라 모아 두어서 내가 갈 때에 연보를 하지 않게 하라

sentences.original_text: On the first day of every week,
each of you should put some of your money in a safe place.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 각자는 너희 돈의 일부를 안전한 곳에 넣어야 한다.

sentences.original_text: Think about how much God has given you.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 너희에게 얼마나 주셨는지 생각해 보아라.

sentences.original_text: Then decide how much you can give each week.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 다음 매주 얼마를 줄 수 있는지 결정해라.

sentences.original_text: the gift will be ready when I come to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 선물이 내가 너희에게 갈 때 준비될 것이다.

sentences.original_text: We will not need to start doing it after I come.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 온 후에 그것을 시작할 필요가 없을 것이다.
